data.title: David Patrick Vickers (1925-2001)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for David Vickers born 1925 Somerville, Middlesex, Massachusetts, United States died 2001 Port Saint Joe, Gulf, Florida, USA including ancestors + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
David Patrick Vickers

Born 20 Jul 1925 in Somerville, Middlesex, Massachusetts, United States

Ancestors

[spouse(s) unknown]

[children unknown]

Died 6 Feb 2001 at age 75 in Port Saint Joe, Gulf, Florida, USA

Profile last modified 1 Mar 2024 | Created 1 Aug 2018

This page has been accessed 80 times.

Biography

David was born in 1925. We was the son of George M. Vickers and Elizabeth Coady. [1] [2] [3] [4]

He served in the military in 1943. [5]

He married Gloria M. Capen. [6] [7] [8]

He passed away in 2001. He is buried at Andersonville National Historic Site, Macon County, Georgia, United States of America. [9]

Sources

↑ "United States Census, 1930," database with images, FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:XQP2-CTX : accessed 15 March 2023), David P Vickers in household of George M Vickers, Somerville, Middlesex, Massachusetts, United States; citing enumeration district (ED) ED 418, sheet 2A, line 21, family 26, NARA microfilm publication T626 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 2002), roll 927; FHL microfilm 2,340,662.

↑ "United States Census, 1940," database with images, FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:K4K8-X25 : 10 January 2021), David P Vickers in household of George M Vickers, Somerville, Middlesex, Massachusetts, United States; citing enumeration district (ED) 21-103, sheet 7B, line 51, family 143, Sixteenth Census of the United States, 1940, NARA digital publication T627. Records of the Bureau of the Census, 1790 - 2007, RG 29. Washington, D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 2012, roll 1705.

↑ "California Divorce Index, 1966-1984," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:VPTV-XZT : 15 May 2014), Gloria M Capen and David P Vickers, Apr 1976; from "California Divorce Index, 1966-1984," database and images, Ancestry (http://www.ancestry.com : 2007); citing San Luis Obispo, California, Health Statistics, California Department of Health Services, Sacramento.
